data.eml:eml: Rediscovery and redescription of Hystrichophora loricana (Grote) (Tortricidae: Olethreutinae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Gilligan, Todd M., Harrison, Terry, Gibson, Loran D. (2009): Rediscovery and redescription of Hystrichophora loricana (Grote) (Tortricidae: Olethreutinae). Zootaxa 2117: 65-68, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.274898
